legend_sri_return_period: The statistical return period for this SRI is once every {{T}} years.
map_form_explanation: Select the KombStRA data to show on the map. To get more information on single fields, just click on the raster cell on the map.
map_header_NEvents_above: Map of the amount of events above SRI {{sri}}
map_header_duration: Map of the duration of the top {{event_rank}} rain event
map_header_month: Map of the month of the top {{event_rank}} rain event
map_header_sri: Map of the heavy rain index (SRI) of the top {{event_rank}} rain event
map_header_top_sri: Map of the top SRI of the year {{year}}
map_header_year: Map of the year of the top {{event_rank}} rain event
parameter_option_SRI: heavy rain index (SRI) of the event
parameter_option_Top_SRI_year: SRI of the strongest event - per year
parameter_option_duration: duration of the heavy rain event
parameter_option_month: month in which the event took place
parameter_option_year: year in which the event took place
parameter_tooltip: Choose the Parameters you would like to see on the map.
popup_download_tooltip: Download the data for this cell as csv.
popup_error_msg_data: We are sorry, there was a problem fetching the data for this cell.
popup_error_msg_position: We are sorry, there was an error finding the data for this location.")
popup_explanation: These are the events for this cell that got categorized. More information about the data in this table can be found in the
popup_explanation_highlight: The values that are highlighted in blue are the values taht get visualized in the actual map.
slider_event_rank_tooltip: Choose the rank of the event. E.g. the Top 1 event per grid cell.
slider_opactity_tooltip: Set the opacity of the layer, to see the underlying map.
slider_sri_tooltip: Choose the SRI to get number of events >= SRI.
slider_year_tooltip: Choose the year for which to get the Top event.
tooltip_fullscreen_close: Open the map in fullscreen mode
